import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Switch active organization for authenticated user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/{realm}/users/switch-organization"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Switch the active organization context for the authenticated user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the organization to switch to"}},"required":["organizationId"],"title":"SwitchOrganizationRepresentation"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Active organization switched successfully"},"400":{"description":"Invalid organization or user is not a member"},"403":{"description":"User does not have access to the organization"},"404":{"description":"Organization not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
